mapper.insert: insert into sBoard(sb_no, cno, mid, sb_title, sb_content, sb_picture) values (seq_sb_no.nextval, #{cno}, #{mid}, #{sb_title}, #{sb_content}, #{sb_picture})
mapper.select: select * from sBoard where cno=#{cno} order by sb_no desc
mapper.update: update sBoard set sb_title=#{sb_title}, sb_content=#{sb_content}, sb_picture=#{sb_picture} where sb_no=#{sb_no}
mapper.select: select name from sBoard sb join member m on sb.mid = m.mid
